plot: Pin Down Girl is a slice of Ethel Brown's life. Ethel found glamour, trave, friendship, money and disillusionment as a "Girl Wrester" from 1950 to 1956.
title: Pin Down Girl: The Story of Ethel Brown
plot_es: Pin Down Girl is a slice of Ethel Brown's life. Ethel found glamour, trave, friendship, money and disillusionment as a "Girl Wrester" from 1950 to 1956.
original_name: Pin Down Girl: The Story of Ethel Brown
plot_en: Pin Down Girl is a slice of Ethel Brown's life. Ethel found glamour, trave, friendship, money and disillusionment as a "Girl Wrester" from 1950 to 1956.
